channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Copy data to workspace Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Copy data to workspace Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2275|2024-08-04T07:01:41.348Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20copy%20data%20to%20workspace%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Copy data to workspace Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not limit which directories can be copied from the Jenkins controller to job workspaces, allowing attackers with Job/Configure permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.
